title: Renormalization group trajectories from resonance factorized S-matrices
abstract: We propose and investigate a large class of models possessing resonance factorized S-matrices. The associated Casimir energy describes a rich pattern of renormalization group trajectories related to flows in the coset models based on the simply laced Lie Algebras. From a simplest resonance S-matrix, satisfying the ``$\phi^3$-property'', we predict new flows in non-unitary minimal models.
